canonical_claim: Mrs. Selvig is not severed and monitors Mark.
Petey will reveal more about the severance process.
The black goo represents lost memories and trauma.
The severance process is a corporate experiment.
Helly is a member of the Eagan family
Mark's wife is not actually dead but severed
The break room is a form of psychological torture
The board does not actually exist and is a facade
Helly's outtie is part of a resistance against Lumon
The severance procedure is a form of psychological control
Lumon is conducting unethical experiments on employees
The goats symbolize the fate of severed employees
Cobel is a full-time severed version of herself.
Dylan will remember his son and rebel against Lumon.
Lumon is using severance for military applications.
Gemma is actually Ms. Casey, Mark's wife.
Mark will discover Gemma's true identity soon.
Lumon is a cult-like organization
Cobel is manipulating events for her own agenda.
Mark will wake up hugging Cobel at the gala
The waffle party is a cover for a sexual ritual
Cobel is trying to prove reintegration is possible
Mark will return to Lumon to find Gemma
The Eagans are using severance for immortality
